text: Ziferblat are an Ukrainian alternative rock band. The group consists of vocalist Daniil Leshchynskyi, guitarist Valentyn Leshchynskyi, and drummer Fedir Khodakov. The group represented Ukraine at the Eurovision Song Contest 2025 with the song "Bird of Pray", where they finished 9th in the final with 218 points. ==Discography== ===Studio albums=== Title Details Peretvorennya * Released: 7 April 2023 * Label: Geisha Ninja Samurai * Formats: Digital download, streaming ===Extended plays=== Title Details Kinoseans * Released: 2017 * Formats: Digital download, streaming Of Us * Released: 2 May 2025 * Label: Geisha Ninja Samurai * Formats: Digital download, streaming ===Singles=== Title Year Peak chart positions Album UKR LTU SWE Heat.
